name: Blizzeta (Autoghost)
author: ywkls
info: Creates an enemy designed to mimic Blizzeta from Twilight Princess, minus the Ball and Chain.Sprites based on work by Strato and EZGBZ 2.5
description: Generates a core enemy and four circling barrier enemies. When a barrier dies, the others become invulnerable and the boss moves faster. When all the barriers die, the boss becomes vulnerable. Only weak to fire generated by the wand.
setup: Requires-std.zhstring.zhghost.zhCreate two enemies. The first is the main boss. The second is a rotating barrier, 2 x 2. Make the main boss vulnerable to nothing, the barriers vulnerable only to fire magic from the wand. Have only the main boss count as a beatable enemy and have them all never return after death.
